page.title: 04FARMING
page.content: There is mainly arable and mixed farming in the{Tyne Valley.}It is renowned for its high class wheat and barley. There is also intensive cultivation -{Weston Nurseries}which is well known for its dried flowers as well as the wide range of flowers and plants it grows and is currently featured on the Scottish gardening television programme{"The Beechgrove {Garden".}There are also{soft fruit and {vegetable holdings}to the{west of {Haddington,}to which people travel from the surrounding district, and also the Edinburgh area for the chance to pick the raspberries and strawberries which are always of the highest quality.
